snippet: WOLNEK--Stephen S. The Jewish Community Relations Council of New York mourns the passing of our esteemed Board member, Executive Committee member, and dear friend, Stephen Wolnek. A national and global Jewish leader, Steve was involved with JCRC-NY for three decades and served as an officer and co-chair of our Israel and International Affairs Commission. May his wife, Elysia, and entire family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Ronald G. Weiner President Michael S. Miller Exec. VP and CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: WOLNEK--Stephen S. The Jewish Community Relations Council of New York mourns the passing of our esteemed Board member, Executive Committee member, and dear friend, Stephen Wolnek. A national and global Jewish leader, Steve was involved with JCRC-NY for three decades and served as an officer and co-chair of our Israel and International Affairs Commission. May his wife, Elysia, and entire family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Ronald G. Weiner President Michael S. Miller Exec. VP and CEO 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WOLNEK, STEPHEN S
